name: 黃孟㛦
objective: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：非牛頓流体、線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
schedule:
1-2.Momentum Transport Problems
3-4.Turbulence
5-6 Viscoelastic Fluid Flow Phenomena
7-8 Equation of Motion
9-10.Boundary Layer Theory
11-12.Multi-Phase Flow
13-14.Non-Newtonian Flow---Characterization of Fluid Behavior
15-17.Non-Newtonian Flow---Fully Developed Tube Flow
scorePolicy:
平時成績：20％
期中與期末考：80％
materials: R. B. Bird et. al.,”Transport Phenomena” 2nd edition, Hohn Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2002
